main event: A dark shaped object was observed traveling at great speed towards a building in New York City in February 1956.
interesting points: The object had what appeared to be fins and emitted a soft glow without reflecting on nearby buildings., The witness described the object as moving deliberately with no sound., The sighting occurred at night with dim street lights obscuring visibility., The object disappeared suddenly after emitting a bright light., The witness took two years to report the sighting out of fear and uncertainty.
sighted object: a dark shaped object with fins and a soft glow
location: New York City, New York, USA
witness description: A citizen of New York City returning home from St. Vincent's Hospital.
